column5: I'm heading from London to Lake St. Clair tomorrow (Sunday June 10)and I have room in the boat, any takers? I have all the gear, all you need is your license/food/beverages
That is one heck of an offer Brian, Wish I was closer. We have wait a few more weeks for muskie opener up here.
Damn id love to go, but I have plans that the wife has commited me to..  Nice of you to offer thou..

Yuuuup well maybe well I hope I mean I hope my buddies wife let's him woohoo.  Brian I hope someone goes with ya I want to get out if I do it will be for a very short morning. I will message u if we make it out tomorrow my buddie will be in from Sudbury I hope he can go.
Very Generous of you Brian, im 6 hours away, or id be all over that one, nothin like those lovely spotties Good Luck tomorrow
I saw that on another thread so I figured you were tied up. I can be out there super early if you want to hook up... maybe drag for some walleye from 5-6 and then slay the big girls!
I will see what they say when they get here. I thought if I told her I would be done by 10 she would say ok but we would stay till noon. I will call or text ya If it's a go
This is why I'm never specific about time zones. Does it really need to be said "we'll be done by 10:00AM Mountain"
Great offer Brian....too far on short notice for me too. And yeah, the way to say it is "Going for a loaf of bread Hon...back at 10 Pacific time."
A very generous offer, I would likely go if I wasn't confined to a wheelchair ( only for a few more months).
I won't hold that against ya I have lots of room in the boat for a chair. If you think we can get ya in and out, being on the boat won't be an issue at all.

Oh sure be that way lol. I will LYK if we are makin it I need to get my boat out there is to much gas it's coming out the breather in thus heat today. Must fish to burn it off that's my reason. What time are ya going
I,ll take a seat,when your up on Simcoe.  Nice offering Brian.
You guys have fish there too?
Thanks for considering me but there is no possible way to get me into any type of boat at the present time.
PM sent. Sorry I missed the post but probably saved you several hours. The only thing biting was the flies.  This is starting to sound like a challenge! I hope the next few months fly by for ya.
